explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of CNN-LSTM model for carbon trading price forecasting, which is a machine learning approach.
explanations.deep learning: The paper employs deep learning techniques, specifically CNN and LSTM, for forecasting.
explanations.neural network: The paper constructs a CNN-LSTM model, which is a type of neural network.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper uses CNN as part of the combined model for forecasting.
explanations.CNN: The paper explicitly mentions the use of convolutional neural network (CNN) in the model.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper uses LSTM as part of the combined model for forecasting.
explanations.LSTM: The paper explicitly mentions the use of long short-term memory network (LSTM) in the model.
explanations.backpropagation: The paper compares the performance with BP (backpropagation) benchmark models.
explanations.BP: The paper mentions BP as one of the benchmark models compared against the proposed model.
